titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 150th anniversary of the founding of the Colorado National Guard.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Senate Committee on Armed Services discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 1/25/2010--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the 150th anniversary of the founding of the Colorado National Guard (Guard) and its exemplary service to the state of Colorado and the nation. Thanks Guard members and their families for their service and sacrifice on behalf of Colorado and the nation. Pledges continued support in providing the Guard with the resources necessary to perform state and federal missions. Expresses condolences to the families of those Guard members who made the ultimate sacrifice while serving in the Guard. Honors the dedication of Guard members who play a central role in protecting the United States and the freedoms and liberties of its citizens.
